name: Impossible Platformer (Doubi88)
description:
A platformer game made for the "Beginner Friendly Game Jam" by Killerkeks.
Theme was "Not enough information", so I decided to make a platformer, where you cannot always see the platforms.

In the end I was out of ideas, so it has only six levels.

Credits:

  • Font https://www.fontspace.com/space-wham-font-f30570
  • Tileset https://opengameart.org/content/platform-tileset-nature 
  • Player Sprite https://opengameart.org/content/dark-ranger 
  • Monsters https://opengameart.org/content/cute-sprites-pack-1
  • Door https://opengameart.org/content/castle-door
  • I made the arrow and the gradient background myself
